segment.source:
Longer Slow Mo\title - The character wheel can be open for much longer!
- Useful for learning swapping!
segment.target:
Longer Slow Mo\title - The character wheel can be open for much longer!
- Useful for learning swapping!

segment.source:
Risk & Reward\title - Fairy bottles always drop gems instead of fairies!
- Fairy bottles drop more gems than usual!
segment.target:
Risk & Reward\title - Fairy bottles always drop gems instead of fairies!
- Fairy bottles drop more gems than usual!

segment.source:
Strong Fairies\title - Fairies take two hits before dying!
- A lifesaver for some of the trickier quests ahead!
segment.target:
Strong Fairies\title - Fairies take two hits before dying!
- A lifesaver for some of the trickier quests ahead!

segment.source:
Gem Magnet\title - Pulls nearby gems towards you!
- Helpful for those more focused on completing levels fast!
segment.target:
Gem Magnet\title - Pulls nearby gems towards you!
- Helpful for those more focused on completing levels fast!

segment.source:
Gem Extractor\title - Defeated enemies drop gems!
- Like defeating enemies? Like hoarding gems? Perfect!
segment.target:
Gem Extractor\title - Defeated enemies drop gems!
- Like defeating enemies? Like hoarding gems? Perfect!

segment.source:
Double Gems\title - Collected gems have a chance of being doubled!
- Perfect for collecting large amounts of gems quickly!
segment.target:
Double Gems\title - Collected gems have a chance of being doubled!
- Perfect for collecting large amounts of gems quickly!

segment.source: Do you want to purchase the item "{0}" for {1}?
segment.target: Do you want to purchase the item "{0}" for {1}?

segment.source: {0} You need {1} more to purchase this item!
segment.target: {0} You need {1} more to purchase this item!

segment.source: Aww... Yikes! Sorry! Whoops! Shoot! Argh... Oof!
segment.target: Aww... Yikes! Sorry! Whoops! Shoot! Argh... Oof!

segment.source:
Longer Invincibility\title - When taking damage, you will remain invincible for longer!
- Useful for those struggling to recover from damage!
segment.target:
Longer Invincibility\title - When taking damage, you will remain invincible for longer!
- Useful for those struggling to recover from damage!

segment.source:
Loyal Fairies\title - Start off with a fairy whenever you spawn!
- Useful for when fairy hunting just isn't your thing!
segment.target:
Loyal Fairies\title - Start off with a fairy whenever you spawn!
- Useful for when fairy hunting just isn't your thing!

segment.source:
Fairy Bargain\title - Grants you a fairy every 40 gems!
- The more you collect, the greater your odds of surviving!
segment.target:
Fairy Bargain\title - Grants you a fairy every 40 gems!
- The more you collect, the greater your odds of surviving!
